entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 12:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
